results.title: Why You Can’t Really Be a Gardener Without Mindfulness
results.abstract: In the last volume of his memoir trilogy, Marc Hamer explains why a garden is not just a place of work — it’s also a place of worship.

media.caption: As a gardener, Marc Hamer said, you “are very much aware that your existence is for a very short period of time, and that you are just like the plants are, rising and blooming, and then fading.”

results.title: This Is Ischia’s Moment in the Sun
results.abstract: The Italian island, long in the shadow of its fashionable neighbor, Capri, is newly chic, but remains deeply authentic, with rocky harbors more likely to dock fishing boats than megayachts.
